english_example_sentence: If the teacher suggests a good idea, the students would be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если учитель предложит хорошую идею, ученики обрадуются.
turkish_example_sentence: Öğretmen iyi bir fikir önerse, öğrenciler sevinir.
